attributes.action: Let the public elect police chief constables
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public are constantly being failed by their local police but while some forces never seem to improve, others do. But whatever happens nobody ever seems to be accountable. Let the public decide in a local vote, as happens in other counties, who should lead the police in their particular area, and so be able to get rid of those in charge who do not reduce crime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
